name: TOUKEN CHRISTMAS
description:
no one deserves to be alone during christmas!
(or set on fire)

For V2: I fixed a glitch where if you didn't buy CCO's flowers you would end up having no textbox or characters for the rest of the game (BUY THE POOR MAN HIS FLOWERS).

Credits:

All characters belong to Touken Ranbu (Nitro+, DMM, etc)

Backgrounds are either from game or other sources
Shopping mall BG from kanbeikurodasamurai7.deviantart.com
Strange hallway BG from Uncle Mugen (@oelvn on twitter)
Dim hospital BG from @jakebowkett on twitter

Kashuu's angry sprite edit from @hajouen on twitter THANKS FAM

Yasu's anime line clips from Anshie @Ansuchi THANKS ALSO

Strange hallway BGM is from Shin Megami Tensei IV OST (Reverse Hills)
Other BGM that isn't from the game is from Sengoku Musou 4 (Arboreal Shade, Splendor, Might, Daybreak & Nostalgia)
